name: market for straw, organic | straw, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19511/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'straw, organic', in the geography of Europe. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This is a constrained market. The justification for a market constraint is included in the comment field of the conditional exchange.This dataset represents the supply of 1 kg of 'straw, organic' from activities that produce it within the geography of RER. Transportation is included in this market, considering average transportation distances from eurostat. More details can be found in the exchange comments of the transportation. A regional market for Europe [RER] is motivated by the low share (in the range of 0.4%-3.8% of total trade quantities between 2010-2016) of import quantities to EU28 from outside (excluding Norway and Switzerland) the Union. Source: Eurostat database, EU trade since 1988 by HS6 (DS-016893), HS6-code: 121300 - Cereal straw and husks, unprepared, whether or not chopped, ground, pressed or in the form of pellets, Assessed on: 2019-05-05.‚Äù;The product 'straw, organic' is a grain. It is an annual crop.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'straw, organic' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of 'straw, organic' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

exchanges.description: Transport distance based on eurostat transport statistics for transport of goods by inland waterways. The transport data was extracted from the database leaf "Transport by type of good (from 2007 onwards with NST2007) (iww_go_atygo)" (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database) on the 2018-06-01. The transport distance was calculated based on the total mass of goods transported and total payload-distance for the NST 2007 category "GT01 - Products of agriculture, hunting, and forestry; fish and other fishing products" in the year 2016 for the European Union (current composition). The average distance of transport by inland waterways for goods in this category in 2016 was 461 km. The fraction of goods transported by inland waterways (in terms of mass) relative to the total mass of goods transported by road, rail and inland waterways was 2.8% in 2016. Therefore, the average distance that goods travelled by inland waterways in 2016 was 13 km. This value is assumed to be representative for Europe.

exchanges.description: Transport distance based on eurostat transport statistics for road freight transport. The transport data was extracted from the database leaf 'Annual road freight transport, by type of goods and type of transport [1 000 t, Mio Tkm], from 2008 onwards (road_go_ta_tg)' (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database) on the 2018-06-01. The transport distance was calculated based on the total mass of goods transported and total payload-distance for the NST 2007 category "GT01 - Products of agriculture, hunting, and forestry; fish and other fishing products" in the year 2016 for all countries for which data was available. The average distance of road transport for goods in this category in 2016 was 154 km. The fraction of goods transported by road (in terms of mass) relative to the total mass of goods transported by road, rail and inland waterways was 91.7% in 2016. Therefore, the average distance that goods travelled by road in 2016 was 141 km. This value is assumed to be representative for Europe.")

exchanges.description: Transport distance based on eurostat transport statistics for railway transport of goods. The transport data was extracted from the database leaf "Railway transport - goods transported, by group of goods - from 2008 onwards based on NST 2007 (1 000 t, million tkm) (rail_go_grpgood)" (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database) on the 2018-06-01. The transport distance was calculated based on the total mass of goods transported and total payload-distance for the NST 2007 category "GT01 - Products of agriculture, hunting, and forestry; fish and other fishing products" in the year 2016 for all countries for which data was available. The average distance of railway transport for goods in this category in 2016 was 265 km. The fraction of goods transported by rail (in terms of mass) relative to the total mass of goods transported by road, rail and inland waterways was 5.5% in 2016. Therefore, the average distance that goods travelled by rail in 2016 was 15 km. This value is assumed to be representative for Europe.
